member.name: T:FLibCore.MVVM.Converters.DoubleToVisibleConverter
member.summary: Converts a bound integer value to a Visibility - Visible if the bound value is greater than or equal to zero, Collapsed otherwise

member.name: T:FLibCore.MVVM.Converters.FalseToVisibleConverter
member.summary: Converts a bound boolean value to an equivalent Visiblity value: Visible if the boolean is false, collapsed if true.

member.name: T:FLibCore.MVVM.Converters.IntToVisibleConverter
member.summary: Converts a bound integer value to a Visibility - Visible if the bound value is greater than or equal to zero, Collapsed otherwise

member.name: T:FLibCore.MVVM.Converters.NotNullToVisibleConverter
member.summary: Converts the bound object to a Visibility value based on whether the object is null. Returns Visible if the object is not null, Collapsed otherwise.

member.name: T:FLibCore.MVVM.Converters.NullToVisibleConverter
member.summary: Converts the bound object to a Visibility value based on whether the object is null. Returns Visible if the object is null, Collapsed otherwise.

member.name: T:FLibCore.MVVM.Converters.TrueToVisibleConverter
member.summary: Converts a bound boolean value to an equivalent Visiblity value: Visible if the boolean is true, collapsed if false.
